text: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا
translation: Ni ho rero Firawuni yatwarwa n’agashavu, aca ashaka kurondera gutera ubwoba Musa hamwe na Bene Israyeli, ko yobomora mu gihugu ca Misiri, maze Twebwe Allah Duca Turamusomesha nturi mw’ibahari, we hamwe n’ingabo ziwe zose.
